General.Name: Smartbroker Holding AG
General.Description: Smartbroker Holding AG operates as online broker in Germany. The company combines various product range of traditional brokers with favorable conditions of neo brokers. It also operates through various stock market portals, including wallstreet-online.de, boersenNews.de, FinanzNachrichten.de, and ARIVA.de. In addition, the company hosts and operates the finance community. The company was formerly known as wallstreet:online AG. Smartbroker Holding AG was founded in 1998 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
